content.question: In paragraph 4, sentences 3-5 (“That’s the role . . . inherit”) serve primarily to

choices.label: challenge the validity of a well-known author’s beliefs
introduce a new perspective on an established field of study
explain how a source relates to the passage’s main argument
acknowledge a drawback to accepting a plausible assumption

content.answer: explain how a source relates to the passage’s main argument

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
